殺害を企てる: (さつがいをくわだてる) - to make an attempt on a person's life
殺意: (さつい) - intent to kill; intent to murder; urge to kill; murderous impulse
殺気だつ: (さっきだつ) - to be seething (with anger); to be frenzied; to be menacing; to be murderous
殺気立つ: (さっきだつ) - to be seething (with anger); to be frenzied; to be menacing; to be murderous
殺法: (さっぽう) - way of murdering; killing method; way of using a sword
殺生: (せっしょう) - killing/destruction of life; barbarous/callous/brutal/cruel
殺生禁断: (せっしょうきんだん) - (yoji) prohibition against hunting and fishing
殺菌作用: (さっきんさよう) - bactericidal action; germicidal action
殺菌力: (さっきんりょく) - sterilizing properties; germicidal properties; bactericidal power
殺菌消毒剤: (さっきんしょうどくざい) - disinfectant
殺菌消毒器: (さっきんしょうどくき) - sterilizer
殺虫: (さっちゅう) - killing insects or pests
殺陣: (さつじん) - sword battle (staged for television, etc.); sword fight
殺風景: (さっぷうけい) - tasteless; dreary; tastelessness
殻: (kaku/kara) - husk , shell, husk, hull, pod, chaff
殻むき: (からむき) - shelling (e.g. of eggs, nuts, crabs and such)
殻を破る: (からをやぶる) - to break up and start anew; to break out of one's shell; to make a fresh start; to go outside oneself
殻を閉ざす: (からをとざす) - to close up like an oyster; to retire into one's shell
殻剥き: (からむき) - shelling (e.g. of eggs, nuts, crabs and such)
殻頂: (かくちょう) - apex of a shell; umbo
殿: (den/dez/tono/dono) - Mr. , rear, rear unit guard; anchor (man)
殿上: (てんじょう) - the court; palace circles; palace floor
殿上人: (てんじょうびと) - courtier; court official
殿下: (てんが) - your Highness; his (or her) Highness
殿下の宝刀: (でんかのほうとう) - one's last resort/trump card; (orig. meaning) treasured family sword
殿内: (どぅんち) - residence of a government official in the Ryukyu Kingdom
殿原: (とのばら) - the nobility; (polite for) man
殿堂: (dendou) - palácio, salão, santuário, templo, santuário; hall da fama
殿堂入り: (でんどういり) - being inducted into a hall of fame
殿様仕事: (とのさましごと) - (yoji) amateur work (in art); work done in carefree mood without regard to time or expenses
殿様商売: (とのさましょうばい) - (yoji) amateurish (dilettantish) business
殿様商法: (とのさましょうほう) - (yoji) amateurish (dilettantish) way of doing business
殿様育ち: (とのさまそだち) - brought up in luxury
殿様芸: (とのさまげい) - dilettantism; amateurism (in art)
殿様蛙: (とのさまがえる) - black-spotted pond frog (Rana nigromaculata)
殿様蝗虫: (トノサマバッタ) - migratory locust (Locusta migratoria)
殿達: (とのたち) - the nobility; (polite for) visitors
毀す: (こわす) - to break/to destroy/to demolish; to wreck/to ruin/to spoil/to damage; to break (a bill, etc.)
毀つ: (こぼつ) - to destroy; to break; to damage
毀れる: (こぼれる) - to be chipped; to be nicked
毀壊: (きかい) - breaking/demolishing/smashing/destroying/wrecking; being broken/being ruined/being destroyed/being worn out
毀誉: (kiyo) - elogio e censura, aprovação e desaprovação, louvor e condenação
毀誉褒貶: (きよほうへん) - (yoji) praise and censure; public criticisms
母さん: (かかさん) - mother; wife (used when speaking to or about one's own wife)
母なる: (ははなる) - Mother (as in Mother Earth, Mother Nature, etc.)
母なる大地: (ははなるたいち) - Mother Earth; earth mother
母上: (ははうえ) - mother (term used in samurai families prior to the Meiji period)
母乳栄養: (ぼにゅうえいよう) - breast feeding; maternal feeding
母体: (ぼたい) - mother's body, esp. when pregnant or after giving birth; parent body/parent organization/heartland
